text: Ashraf Ud-Doullah Pahloan is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Jamalpur-2. ==Career== Pahloan was elected to parliament from Jamalpur-2 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1988. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ashraf Ud-Doullah Pahloan
